response: "{ \"title\": \"Medium: Calculate the Sum of Divisors\", \"description\": \"The sum of divisors of a number includes all its proper divisors. Write a function `sum_of_divisors` that calculates the sum of divisors for a given integer.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef sum_of_divisors(n: int) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `n` (int): A positive integer.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the sum of all proper divisors of the input number.\\n\", \"code\": \"def sum_of_divisors(n: int) -> int:\\n    def is_divisor(d: int) -> bool:\\n        return d != 1 and n % d == 0\\n    return sum(i for i in range(1, n) if is_divisor(i)) + n\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert sum_of_divisors(28) == 60\", \"assert sum_of_divisors(6) == 12\", \"assert sum_of_divisors(15) == 24\", \"assert sum_of_divisors(13) == 14\"] }"
